The Grand Trunk Road (GT Road) also known as NH-1 runs right through KARNAL ( The city of Daanveer Karna ) . It's 125 km from Delhi and also approximately same distance from Chandigarh as well. You can catch a bus from Chandigarh ISBT and Delhi ISBT.

You can catch a bus to Karnal from Indraparasth bus station in New Delhi. You can get a bus from Kashmiri Gate Bus station. Karnal is 125 km from Delhi. Traveling from Delhi to Karnal by a bus takes normally 2 to 3 hours depending on the traffic conditions in city range of Delhi. by chandra
Train to Karnal can be taken from either
Railway Station or from Old Delhi railway station, and Nizzamuddin as well. Train takes two hours to reach Karnal from Delhi. And is taken a passenger train it takes 3 long hours in this case.
